original_text: At the same time my reason returned unto me; and for the glory of my kingdom, mine honour and brightness returned unto me; and my counsellors and my lords sought unto me; and I was established in my kingdom, and excellent majesty was added unto me.
korean_text: 그 때에 내 총명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 내 나라의 영광에 대하여도 내 위엄과 광명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 나의 모사들과 관원들이 내게 찾아오니 내가 내 나라에서 다시 세움을 받고 또 지극한 위세가 내게 더하였느니라

sentences.original_text: and for the glory of my kingdom
mine honour and brightness returned unto me
and my counsellors and my lords sought unto me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 모사들과 나의 고관들이 나를 찾았다

sentences.original_text: and I was established in my kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 나의 왕국에서 굳건히 서게 되었다

sentences.original_text: and excellent majesty was added unto me
